definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.chinese: 她在陰雨天總是心灰意懶。

sentences.english: The general manager is so frustrated for the poor performance of his company.
sentences.chinese: 公司業績總是不好，總經理真是心灰意懶。

sentences.english: A feeling of discouragement for the moment bore down heavily upon him.
sentences.chinese: 一陣心灰意懶的情緒頓時沉重地壓在他的心頭。

sentences.english: Chinglish: The total manager is very sad because the achievement is not good.
sentences.chinese: 公司業績總是不好，總經理真是心灰意懶。

sentences.english: Eg. The wet weather depresses me.
It had come to that, he reflected despondently .
sentences.chinese: 事情已經到了這個地步了，他沉思着，感到心灰意懶。

sentences.english: When the Dowager abolished the old examination system, he had begun to fade .
sentences.chinese: 自從西太后廢除舊科舉制度，他就心灰意懶了。
他的斷然拒絕使我心灰意懶。
在陰雨天裏我總是心灰意懶。
